); }; IndexPage.getInitialProps = async (context: any) => { console.log(context.query); const { name } = context.query; // console.log(name, "88888888888888888888"); // console.log( name ); const res = await fetch(`http://localhost:3001/search/${encodeURI(name)}`); const data = await res.json(); //这边返回的数据会被挂载到组件的props中 // console.log(data,'88888888888888888888'); return { show: data }; }; export default withRouter(IndexPage);
